title: MD
biography: Deiva Vaakku is a 1992 Indian Tamil-language drama film directed by M. S. Madhu and produced by T. Siva. The film stars Karthik and Revathi. It was released on 11 September 1992.
aiSummary: T. Sundararaman is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 21 at Health systems reform (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, Social Science & Medicine, BMJ. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
